Package cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content.selection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Draggable
    Draggable object.
    Highlightable
    Highlightable object.
    MultiSelectable
    Object can be part of a multi-selection.
    MultiSelectableDraggable
    Dummy interface joining Draggable and MultiSelectable
    Selectable
    Object can be selected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MultiNodeSelectionContainer
    Container for selecting multiple MultiSelectable objects.
    RubberBandSelection
    Rubber band selection - rectangle selection by dragging mouse, allows adding and removing nodes from existing selection.
